mapper.insert: insert into subjectmember (userid, semester,area1,area2, area3, subname, credit, pro, design, separ, bsm) values(#{userid}, #{semester},#{area1},#{area2},#{area3},#{subname},#{credit},#{pro},#{design},#{separ},#{bsm} )
mapper.select: select * from subjectmember order by semester=#{semester}
select * from subjectmember order by semester
